item.title: Audi RS6 C7 Avant 2016 BR v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Audi RS6 C7 Avant 2016 BR v1.0 ETS2

Audi RS6 C7 Avant 2016 BR
Version 1.50 E 1.51
Game: Euro truck simulator 2



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MERCEDES BENZ 1853 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
MERCEDES BENZ 1853 v1.0 ETS2

Relaçao do Mercedes Benz Schwere klasse 1853 V 1.0 v 1.49/1.50 Cabine
– Sleepe /eurocab. Chassi -4×2/6×4. Motor
– 340cv, 381 cv, 480cv. 435cv, 503 cv, 530cv.

Transmision -12 vel ,16 vel, 8+1 vel, 12 vel, 8+1 vel.

Interior
– Standard, Exclusive. Pintura
– 12 Opcionais pinturais. Parachoque
– 12 tipos de parachoque. Logo
– V8 Retrovisores 3 tipos retrovisores Maçanetas
– 2 tipos Tanque
– 11 tipos Grande frontal
– 2 tipos Quebra sol
– 2 tipos Buzina
– 2 tipos Defletores de teto
– 1 tipo Defletores de lateral
– 1 tipo Espace 4 tipos Adesivo
– 1 tipo Defletores de canto 2 tipo

–

item.title: FORD F14000 PITIBULL v1.0 ETS2

Farol de Neblina. Parachoque – 3 tipos Piso – 3 tipos Grade – 3 tipos. Laterna – 2 tipos. item.title: Caterpillar C Series engines & sounds pack v1.5 ATS
item.description:
Caterpillar C Series engines & sounds pack v1.5 ATS

This mod contains the Caterpillar C Series lines, which are:
– C13 of 380 hp
– C15 of 435, 450, 475, 500, 550 and 625 HP King of the Hill
– C15 Pre-Acert 600 hp and C16 Acert of 575, 600 and 675 HP Tuned
– C15 Stock of 375, 475, 500 and 550 HP
– C15 Straight Pipes of 375, 475, 500 and 550 HP
– C18 Marine of 765 and 950 HP Tuned (use for heavy loads)

Available for the following truck modifications:

Autocar
AT64F (apli0120/XBS)

Freightliner
Century/Columbia (Alexander Sentayakov/Schurik43rus)
Classic XL (BSA)
Classic XL (Jon-Ruda)
FLB (Harven)
FLC (XBS)
FLD (Harven)

International
Lonestar
LT
9400i (Slava1)
9300i Eagle (Panter/Guidot)
9900i

Kenworth
K100 (CyrusTheVyrus/Shaneke Game)
K100e (Overfloater)
T600 (FrankPerú)
T660 (FrankPerú)
T660 (FrankPerú/JorgeGamer444)
T680
T800 (FrankPerú)
T800 (FrankPerú / Yanred)
T800 (GTM)
T880 (FrankPerú)
W900
W900a (Bigdaddy)
W900b (GTM)
W990 (FrankPerú/Harven)
K200 (RTA)

Peterbilt
379 (Rednek)
389
389 v2 (Viper2)
579
Proyect 3XX (guidot)

Volvo
VNL

Western Star
49X
57X

Includes sound support in the game’s convoy mode.

Version 1.5:
– Correction of sound tuning curves in the engine brake in the standard C13-C15 variant.
– Added Kenworth T800 2016 (FrankPerú/Yanred).
– New definition files for sound banks.
– Volume adjustment on Stock and Straight Pipes variants



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
